thread.title: Man Utd 3 - St Etienne 0: Ibrahimovic hat-trick gives Mourinho’s men first-leg advantage
thread.title_full: Man Utd 3 - St Etienne 0: Ibrahimovic hat-trick gives Mourinho’s men first-leg advantage

title: Man Utd 3 - St Etienne 0: Ibrahimovic hat-trick gives Mourinho’s men first-leg advantage
text:
Man Utd 3 - St Etienne 0: Ibrahimovic hat-trick gives Mourinho’s men first-leg advantage ZLATAN IBRAHIMOVIC gave Manchester United a crucial Europa League advantage by netting a hat-trick against St Etienne. PUBLISHED: 21:46, Thu, Feb 16, 2017 | UPDATED: 21:57, Thu, Feb 16, 2017 
Jose Mourinho’s men still have a tough trip to France ahead for the return leg of their last-32 tie and could've been heading to the Stade Geoffroy-Guichard with an even bigger lead. 
Anthony Martial, Juan Mata and Paul Pogba all had decent chances but squandered their efforts in front of goal when it mattered most. 
United defender Eric Bailly gave the hosts an early scare when his poor backpass inside the opening three minutes forced Sergio Romero into action with Romain Hamouma intercepting the ball. GETTY Zlatan Ibrahimovic netted a hat-trick against St Ettiene 
Down the other end Martial looked keen to impress Mourinho with his dribbling skills and he came close to breaking the deadlock with a fierce shot straight at Stephane Ruffier from close-range. 
Moments later Ibrahimovic gave United the lead on 15 minutes with a slice of luck as his deflected free-kick came off Vincent Pajot in the St Etienne wall to trickle over the line. 
Mourinho made changes in the second half as Jesse Lingard and Juan Mata entered the field as they went in search of an another goal. Manchester United player ratings against Saint-Etienne in Europa League Thu, February 16, 2017
